content.text: he stacks Value returned: a return-separated list of the full path names for all the open stacks, in front-to-back order
f the number of lines of the stacks = 1 then ... -- only one stack open else ... -- multiple stacks open

n whatStacks put longNamesToShort(the stacks) into theStacks answer "The stacks currently open are:" & return & return & theStacks end whatStacks function longNamesToShort longStackList put empty into shortStackList set the itemDelimiter to ":" repeat with lineNum = 1 to the number of lines in longStackList put last item of line lineNum of longStackList into Â¬ line lineNum of shortStackList end repeat set itemDelimiter to comma return shortStackList end longNamesToShort
card window function new features stacks windows
